channel.title: Microsoft-365-platform-community-calls on Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft-365-platform-community-calls on Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 3rd of May, 2022
item.description: Three demos - Extend your Microsoft Teams app to Outlook and Office, Introducing new M365 Assessment Tool with SharePoint Syntex Module, and Run Office Scripts with a button- now in Excel for Windows. Review latest articles, documents, and podcasts.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 26th of April, 2022
item.description: Two great demos: Create an app that extends across Teams, Outlook, and Office, and Graph Connectors updates and Postman samples.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 19th of April, 2022
item.description: Three great demos: Latest on Microsoft Graph Data Connect datasets, Extending Teams apps to Outlook and Office.com, and Graph Connectors updates and Postman samples. The Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) â€“ April 2022 update is now available!

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 12th of April, 2022
item.description: Two demos - Building in meeting document signing app for Microsoft Teams and Building wellbeing solution with Teams and Viva Connections. Released Microsoft 365 Unified Sample Solution Gallery with 1040 samples, 3 new articles and 3 Teams documents.
